title: Little 'speed ups'
body: I don't play league much anymore so I don't know if this is an older bug or not but everything 'speeds ups' for half a second ever ~5 seconds. It's like everyone including minions gets a run speed boost. It's happened the last 2 aram games.

replies.body:
Are you referring to the Homeguard boost you start with in ARAM now (functions the same as SR)? I don't believe that affects minions though.

Otherwise it sounds like packet loss to me (related to your connection not the game itself). High ping is the packets taking a long time to get to Riot and back, packet loss is certain packets not making it at all, usually resulting in a freeze and then a rapid catch up.

Are you using a wireless connection? If so I'd say that's the most likely culprit.

No, this happens all through the game no matter where I am.

I have a constant 33ms, never changes. I'm using ethernet and I have quite good internet. I'm only having problems on this game as well.
Is there anything else that could cause this?

Packet loss doesn't reflect in your ping so it could still be that. Do you experience freezes before the speed ups (like it's catching up)?

If it's a connection issue it's entirely possible it's only your connection to League, rather than your connection in general, so having good internet otherwise doesn't rule that out, but it's also a bit of a strange one. I'm not convinced it's a connection issue either, but it is something individual to you at least.

You can give this site a sus for some insight into your individual connection and your ISPs connection to League: https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/

I'd also recommend you try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair.

If that doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
The newest update seems to have fixed it, thanks for your help though.
